text: <@U026PHQ3J> <@U3M4RRNQ5> <@U02F8LF2X> <@U051P3FPY> ICRPG game will be Wed evening post work...6ish?. If anyone wants to get together before hand to make up a character let me know.
If you want a copy of the pdf, I'll send them to you via email...hesitant to provide in open chat, I really want to support the creator and I just feel funny about blindly handing out his work.
you could also get a download from DriveThru if you're into supporting that sort of thingy

kind of interesting, a lot of new board games are moving to a similar simplified rpg model it seems like
Like the new Dark Souls game looks beautiful but it’s still just the same as committing to sit down and learn an rpg worth of rules

attachments.title: Dark Souls: The Board Game
attachments.text: Description from the publisher: The Dark Souls board game is a brutally hard exploration miniatures game for 1-4 players. Prepare to die. The game features a &quot;fast set-up, long reveal&quot; mechanism that gets you into the game quickly and builds the location as you explore. The sense of danger is palpable as you discover new locations and the monsters that inhabit these dark places. The core combat mechanism and enemy behavior system forces deep strategic play and clever management of stamina to survive. Dark Souls includes numerous boss and mini-boss encounters &mdash; including one against the Dragon Slayer Ornstein and Executioner Smough &mdash; and utilizes an innovative behavior mechanism so that no two encounters are ever the same, thus giving the game near infinite replayability.
attachments.fallback: BoardGameGeek: Dark Souls: The Board Game
